question: i am having a very big problem i will be getting married soon. i would like to know will it ge ja'eez for me to keep my wife away from sister due to my sister being full of fitna.
answer:
QUESTION
my sister is a very unhappy person and seems to make everyone unhappy. due to the fact that i will be getting married soon insha allah, i have been ythinking of keeping my wife away form my sister for our happinesss and fulfilment. please help confused
ANSWER


Share:
It will be permissible to keep your wife at a distance from your sister.
However, when they meet, they should be polite to each other.

To maintain family ties, you should at least once in a while make them meet
very briefly. In this way, the obligation of maintaining family ties is
achieved, and a distance is also maintained.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Moulana Imraan Vawda
FATWA DEPT.
